00010 #include <string.h>
00011 
00012 #include "cdata.h"
00013 #include "u_quick.h"
00014 #include "getbits.h"
00015 
00016 
00017 #define QBITMASK 0xff
00018 
00019 
00020 USHORT quick_text_loc;
00021 
00022 
00023 USHORT Unpack_QUICK(UCHAR *in, UCHAR *out, USHORT origsize){
00024     USHORT i, j;
00025     UCHAR *outend;
00026 
00027     initbitbuf(in);
00028 
00029     outend = out+origsize;
00030     while (out < outend) {
00031         if (GETBITS(1)!=0) {
00032             DROPBITS(1);
00033             *out++ = text[quick_text_loc++ & QBITMASK] = (UCHAR)GETBITS(8);  DROPBITS(8);
00034         } else {
00035             DROPBITS(1);
00036             j = (USHORT) (GETBITS(2)+2);  DROPBITS(2);
00037             i = (USHORT) (quick_text_loc - GETBITS(8) - 1);  DROPBITS(8);
00038             while(j--) {
00039                 *out++ = text[quick_text_loc++ & QBITMASK] = text[i++ & QBITMASK];
00040             }
00041         }
00042     }
00043     quick_text_loc = (USHORT)((quick_text_loc+5) & QBITMASK);
00044 
00045     return 0;
00046 }
